title: Lugbara (1966) Genesis Portion
description: Lugbara, or Lugbarati, is the language of the Lugbara people. It is spoken in the West Nile region in northwestern Uganda, as well as the Democratic Republic of the Congo's Orientale Province.

language.name: Lugbara
language.area: Northwest, Arua and Yumbe districts. Also in Democratic Republic of the Congo.
